name: Hog Rider
description:
This is a simple game which let's you feel how it's like to be a Hog Rider. I'm sure you always dreamed about your own Hog and becoming a Rider. With this game your soul can finally rest. Downloading highly recommend because it doesn't scale properly in the browser.

Default key controlls:
- jumping: space
- screaming: e
- pause: escape

In theory you can change key controlls via options but it was first time I made such a system and it will 100% make game unplayable unless you know Unity's key names. That's why I made reset button (it also resets your highscore)
